member.name: T:Munq.MVC3.MunqDependencyResolver
member.summary: Implements the MVC3 IDependencyResolver interface using the Munq IOC Container. Requires a reference to Munq.MVC3.dll.

member.name: M:Munq.MVC3.MunqDependencyResolver.GetService(System.Type)
member.returns: The instance the type resolves to, or null.

member.name: M:Munq.MVC3.MunqDependencyResolver.GetServices(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves all possible instances of the specified type.
member.returns: The list of instances the type resolves to, may be empty.

member.name: P:Munq.MVC3.MunqDependencyResolver.Container
member.summary: Gets the Munq IocContainer used by the MVC3 IDependencyResolver.
